snippet: Women in Arab countries are expanding their role as governments are remade and new constitutions are written.
abstract: Editorial contends that Arab countries will not succeed unless women are fully incorporated into political and economic life; notes that Arab Spring has allowed Muslim girls and women to dream big dreams, and it is crucial that new constitutions that are being drafted protect and expand women's rights.
lead_paragraph: Women in Arab countries are expanding their role as governments are remade and new constitutions are written.

headline.print_headline: Women Fight to Define The Arab Spring
headline.seo: Women Fight to Define the Arab Spring
headline.main: Women Fight to Define the Arab Spring

keywords.value: Middle East and North Africa Unrest (2010- )
